00010 const char * const coordinate_matrix_align1_vec_mul = 
00011 "//segmented parallel reduction. At present restricted to up to 256 threads\n"
00012 "void segmented_parallel_reduction(unsigned int row, \n"
00013 "                                  float val, \n"
00014 "                                  __local unsigned int * shared_rows, \n"
00015 "                                  __local float * inter_results) \n"
00016 "{ \n"
00017 "  barrier(CLK_LOCAL_MEM_FENCE); \n"
00018 "  shared_rows[get_local_id(0)] = row; \n"
00019 "  inter_results[get_local_id(0)] = val; \n"
00020 " \n"
00021 "  barrier(CLK_LOCAL_MEM_FENCE); \n"
00022 "  if( get_local_id(0) >=  1 && row == shared_rows[get_local_id(0) -  1] ) { inter_results[get_local_id(0)] += inter_results[get_local_id(0) -  1]; }  \n"
00023 "  barrier(CLK_LOCAL_MEM_FENCE); \n"
00024 "  if( get_local_id(0) >=  2 && row == shared_rows[get_local_id(0) -  2] ) { inter_results[get_local_id(0)] += inter_results[get_local_id(0) -  2]; } \n"
00025 "  barrier(CLK_LOCAL_MEM_FENCE); \n"
00026 "  if( get_local_id(0) >=  4 && row == shared_rows[get_local_id(0) -  4] ) { inter_results[get_local_id(0)] += inter_results[get_local_id(0) -  4]; } \n"
00027 "  barrier(CLK_LOCAL_MEM_FENCE); \n"
00028 "  if( get_local_id(0) >=  8 && row == shared_rows[get_local_id(0) -  8] ) { inter_results[get_local_id(0)] += inter_results[get_local_id(0) -  8]; } \n"
00029 "  barrier(CLK_LOCAL_MEM_FENCE); \n"
00030 "  if( get_local_id(0) >= 16 && row == shared_rows[get_local_id(0) - 16] ) { inter_results[get_local_id(0)] += inter_results[get_local_id(0) - 16]; } \n"
00031 "  barrier(CLK_LOCAL_MEM_FENCE); \n"
00032 "  if( get_local_id(0) >= 32 && row == shared_rows[get_local_id(0) - 32] ) { inter_results[get_local_id(0)] += inter_results[get_local_id(0) - 32]; } \n"
00033 "  barrier(CLK_LOCAL_MEM_FENCE); \n"
00034 "  if( get_local_id(0) >= 64 && row == shared_rows[get_local_id(0) - 64] ) { inter_results[get_local_id(0)] += inter_results[get_local_id(0) - 64]; } \n"
00035 "  barrier(CLK_LOCAL_MEM_FENCE); \n"
00036 "  if( get_local_id(0) >= 128 && row == shared_rows[get_local_id(0) - 128] ) { inter_results[get_local_id(0)] += inter_results[get_local_id(0) - 128]; } \n"
00037 "  barrier(CLK_LOCAL_MEM_FENCE); \n"
00038 "  //if( get_local_id(0) >= 256 && row == shared_rows[get_local_id(0) - 256] ) { inter_results[get_local_id(0)] += inter_results[get_local_id(0) - 256]; } \n"
00039 "  //barrier(CLK_LOCAL_MEM_FENCE); \n"
00040 " \n"
00041 "}; \n"
00042 "void impl_vec_mul( \n"
00043 "          __global const uint2 * coords, //(row_index, column_index) \n"
00044 "          __global const float * elements, \n"
00045 "          __global const float * vector,  \n"
00046 "          __global float * result, \n"
00047 "          unsigned int size, \n"
00048 "          __local unsigned int * shared_rows, \n"
00049 "          __local float * inter_results) \n"
00050 "{\n"
00051 "  uint2 tmp; \n"
00052 "  float val; \n"
00053 "  const uint last_index = get_local_size(0) - 1; \n"
00054 "  shared_rows[get_local_id(0)] = 0; \n"
00055 "  inter_results[get_local_id(0)] = 0.0f; \n"
00056 "  unsigned int for_size = (size - 1) / get_local_size(0); \n"
00057 "  \n"
00058 "  for (unsigned int k = 0; k <= for_size; ++k)\n"
00059 "  { \n"
00060 "    unsigned int index = k * get_local_size(0) + get_local_id(0); \n"
00061 "    barrier(CLK_GLOBAL_MEM_FENCE);\n"
00062 "  \n"
00063 "    if (index < size)\n"
00064 "    {\n"
00065 "      tmp = coords[index]; \n"
00066 "      val = elements[index] * vector[tmp.y]; \n"
00067 "      \n"
00068 "      if (get_local_id(0) == 0) \n"
00069 "      { \n"
00070 "        //check for carry from previous loop run: \n"
00071 "        if (tmp.x == shared_rows[last_index]) \n"
00072 "          val += inter_results[last_index]; \n"
00073 "        else \n"
00074 "          result[shared_rows[last_index]] += inter_results[last_index]; \n"
00075 "      } \n"
00076 "      segmented_parallel_reduction(tmp.x, val, shared_rows, inter_results); \n"
00077 "    }\n"
00078 "    else\n"
00079 "      segmented_parallel_reduction(0, 0, shared_rows, inter_results); //all threads have to enter this function\n"
00080 "     \n"
00081 "    barrier(CLK_GLOBAL_MEM_FENCE);\n"
00082 "  \n"
00083 "    if (get_local_id(0) != last_index &&\n"
00084 "         shared_rows[get_local_id(0)] != shared_rows[get_local_id(0) + 1] &&\n"
00085 "         inter_results[get_local_id(0)] != 0) \n"
00086 "    { \n"
00087 "      result[tmp.x] += inter_results[get_local_id(0)]; \n"
00088 "    }\n"
00089 "  } //for \n"
00090 "   \n"
00091 "  barrier(CLK_GLOBAL_MEM_FENCE | CLK_LOCAL_MEM_FENCE); \n"
00092 "   \n"
00093 "  if (get_local_id(0) == last_index && inter_results[get_local_id(0)] != 0) \n"
00094 "    result[shared_rows[get_local_id(0)]] += inter_results[get_local_id(0)]; \n"
00095 "};\n"
00096 "__kernel void vec_mul( \n"
00097 "          __global const uint2 * coords, //(row_index, column_index) \n"
00098 "          __global const float * elements, \n"
00099 "          __global const float * vector,  \n"
00100 "          __global float * result, \n"
00101 "          unsigned int size, \n"
00102 "          __local unsigned int * shared_rows, \n"
00103 "          __local float * inter_results) \n"
00104 "{ \n"
00105 "  \n"
00106 "  __global const uint2 * group_coords_start   = coords   + (size * get_group_id(0))       / get_num_groups(0);\n"
00107 "  __global const uint2 * group_coords_end     = coords   + (size * (get_group_id(0) + 1)) / get_num_groups(0);\n"
00108 "  __global const float * group_elements_start = elements + (size * get_group_id(0))       / get_num_groups(0);\n"
00109 "  unsigned int group_size = (size * (get_group_id(0) + 1)) / get_num_groups(0) - (size * get_group_id(0)) / get_num_groups(0);\n"
00110 "  \n"
00111 "  //find suitable start:\n"
00112 "  uint2 tmp;\n"
00113 "  if (group_coords_start != coords) //first pointer stays at start, others search for start of next row\n"
00114 "  {\n"
00115 "    tmp = *group_coords_start;\n"
00116 "    while ( (*group_coords_start).x == tmp.x && \n"
00117 "            (group_coords_start != group_coords_end) )\n"
00118 "    {\n"
00119 "      ++group_coords_start;\n"
00120 "      ++group_elements_start;\n"
00121 "      --group_size;\n"
00122 "    }\n"
00123 "  }\n"
00124 "  //if the row index does not change within the group, then group is inactive.\n"
00125 "  \n"
00126 "  \n"
00127 "  //find suitable end for remaining active groups:\n"
00128 "  if (group_coords_start != group_coords_end)\n"
00129 "  {\n"
00130 "    if (group_coords_end != coords + size)   //do not increment or dereference beyond available array length\n"
00131 "    {\n"
00132 "      tmp = *group_coords_end;\n"
00133 "      while ( (*group_coords_end).x == tmp.x && \n"
00134 "              (group_coords_end != coords + size) )\n"
00135 "      {\n"
00136 "        ++group_coords_end;\n"
00137 "        ++group_size;\n"
00138 "      }\n"
00139 "    }\n"
00140 "    //run workers:\n"
00141 "    impl_vec_mul( group_coords_start,    //coords pointer\n"
00142 "                  group_elements_start,  //elements pointer\n"
00143 "                  vector,    //vector pointer\n"
00144 "                  result,    //result pointer\n"
00145 "                  group_size,  //size of group (unsigned int)\n"
00146 "                  shared_rows, //local row buffer\n"
00147 "                  inter_results); //local result buffer\n"
00148 "  }\n"
00149 "}\n"
00150 ; //coordinate_matrix_align1_vec_mul
00151 
00152   }  //namespace kernels
00153  }  //namespace linalg
00154 }  //namespace viennacl
